GSD.description:
scsi: qedf: Add stag_work to all the vports

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.10 by commit 0be556512cd0dfcf5ec1a140d9f42d88221a5d4e. For more details please see the references link.
